# type

**Instance Property**

A string value representing the card’s type of payment.

## Declaration

```swift
ApplePayPaymentMethodType type;
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentMethodType] for the list of types.

## Payment Method Types

- **ApplePayPaymentMethodType**: A string that represents the type of the payment method.

## Accessing payment method data

- **displayName**: A string, suitable for display, that describes the card.
- **network**: A string, suitable for display, that is the name of the payment network backing the card.
- **paymentPass**: The payment pass object currently selected to complete the payment.
- **billingContact**: The billing contact associated with the card.
